trans-unit.source: Represents a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be used to match speech input.
A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object contains a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be recognized when spoken.
You can build lists of alternatives from arrays of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects or arrays of <xref:System.String> objects.
Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf.Items%2A> property to access the alternative items in the list.

The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> class represents the `one-of` element from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
For information about the SRGS `one-of` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [one-of Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> class from an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> objects.
The alternative items to add.
items is `null`.
Any element in the items array is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> class from an array of <xref href="System.String"></xref> objects.
The alternative items to add.
items is `null`.
Any element in the items array is `null`.
Adds an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem"></xref> containing a word or a phrase to the list of alternatives.
The item to add to the list of alternatives.
item is `null`.
Gets the list of all the alternatives contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf"></xref> element.

The alternative words and phrases returned by this property may have been added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> or <xref:System.String> objects.
Returns the list of alternatives.
